title: Avenging Angel
description: Enjoy major events 3, 7 and 10 years after the collapse of the United States.Curious after movie-talk, the Hopetown team travels to the mall to see if the movies had it right and they did! Ghouls haunt the mall parking lot and there is a battle to survive in the Romero-styled prose.Hannah is grown and ready to go out on her own to kill monsters and find more of her kind, but when she and her friends discover a group of people who chose to inoculate themselves and fight for the world,Hannah second-guesses who and what she is. Although the hybrids and survivors fight together, they prove no match for the hive-like behavior of the zombies and find that immunity from being bitten doesn't mean they won't be eaten alive. Hannah's status of avenging angel is called into question when she brings death right back to her own home and the people at Hopetown.Just when you think all the secrets have been told and the survivors have won the war against the infection, find out the last words of a key character and what those words may predict. Read about the beginning of a new battle to inherit what is left of life as we know it. and pick your side.The gore and zombies never stop.Z is for Zombie Order:George’s TermsEvent HorizonShadow of DoubtDevil’s DetailsRageWhat Lies beneathAvenging Angel End of the RoadTerms Mystique
author: Catt Dahman
